接口 DeptMapper

所有超级接口:
com.baomidou.mybatisplus.core.mapper.BaseMapper<Dept>, com.baomidou.mybatisplus.core.mapper.Mapper<Dept>
@Mapper public interface DeptMapper extends com.baomidou.mybatisplus.core.mapper.BaseMapper<Dept>
部门数据访问接口

  • 方法详细资料

    • selectByRoleId

      List<Dept> selectByRoleId(@Param("roleId") Long roleId)
      根据角色ID查询部门列表

    • selectByUserId

      List<Dept> selectByUserId(@Param("userId") Long userId)
      根据用户ID查询部门列表

    • selectChildren

      @Select("SELECT * FROM org_dept WHERE parent_id = #{parentId} AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY order_num") List<Dept> selectChildren(@Param("parentId") Long parentId)
      查询子部门列表

    • selectPath

      @Select("WITH RECURSIVE dept_path AS ( SELECT id, parent_id, name, 1 as level FROM org_dept WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted = 0 UNION ALL SELECT d.id, d.parent_id, d.name, dp.level + 1 FROM org_dept d INNER JOIN dept_path dp ON d.id = dp.parent_id WHERE d.deleted = 0)SELECT * FROM dept_path ORDER BY level DESC") List<Dept> selectPath(Long id)
      查询部门路径

    • selectTree

      @Select("WITH RECURSIVE dept_tree AS ( SELECT id, parent_id, name, 0 as level FROM org_dept WHERE parent_id IS NULL AND deleted = 0 UNION ALL SELECT d.id, d.parent_id, d.name, dt.level + 1 FROM org_dept d INNER JOIN dept_tree dt ON d.parent_id = dt.id WHERE d.deleted = 0)SELECT * FROM dept_tree ORDER BY level, order_num") List<Dept> selectTree()
      查询部门树
